Html:
I just downloaded the latest version of Naudio and I'm going to upgrade my program from using the AudioFileReader to using the MediaFoundationReader.
The problem seems to the that I cannot use the FadeInOutSampleProvider with the MediaFoundationReader. Does anyone know how to use these two together?
Just do "ToSampleProvider" on the MediaFoundationReader, and then you can chain it into FadeInOutSampleProvider
